name: Calendar Event
description: A plugin to generate calendar event links for Google and Outlook
author: MintplexLabs

examples.prompt: Use Calendar Event to schedule a team meeting for tomorrow at 2pm for 1 hour
Use Calendar Event to set up a project review for Friday at 3pm
examples.call: {"title": "Project Review", "date": "2024-03-22", "time": "15:00", "duration": 90, "description": "End of week project status review", "location": "Virtual Meeting Room"}

examples.prompt: Schedule a training session next week Tuesday morning
examples.call: {"title": "Training Session", "date": "2024-03-26", "time": "09:00", "duration": 120, "description": "New system training for team members", "location": "Training Room B"}
